title: 'Worst hurricane ever' hits Mexico
text:
'Worst hurricane ever' hits Mexico 'Worst hurricane ever' hits Mexico There are 6 comments on the Financial Times story from 14 hrs ago, titled 'Worst hurricane ever' hits Mexico . In it, Financial Times reports that: 
A hurricane described as the strongest "on the whole planet, in all of history", with winds that reached 325km per hour at one point, hit western Mexico late on Friday, as the country braced for severe damage, tidal surges and landslides. US President Barack Obama tweeted: "Our thoughts are with the Mexican people as they brace for Hurricane Patricia. Join the discussion below, or Read more at Financial Times.
